body_html:
@gunan Inside nvidia/cuda:7.5-cudnn5-devel, it looks like the so moved:

# ls -l /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu | grep dnn
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root       29 Aug 12 05:11 libcudnn.so -> /etc/alternatives/libcudnn_so
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root       17 Jun 10 13:07 libcudnn.so.5 -> libcudnn.so.5.1.3
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 60696704 Jun 10 13:07 libcudnn.so.5.1.3
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root       32 Aug 12 05:11 libcudnn_static.a -> /etc/alternatives/libcudnn_stlib
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 59715990 Jun 10 13:07 libcudnn_static_v5.a

whereas nothing:

# ls /usr/local/cuda/lib64 | grep dnn

body:
@gunan Inside `nvidia/cuda:7.5-cudnn5-devel`, it looks like the `so` moved:

```
# ls -l /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu | grep dnn
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root       29 Aug 12 05:11 libcudnn.so -> /etc/alternatives/libcudnn_so
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root       17 Jun 10 13:07 libcudnn.so.5 -> libcudnn.so.5.1.3
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 60696704 Jun 10 13:07 libcudnn.so.5.1.3
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root       32 Aug 12 05:11 libcudnn_static.a -> /etc/alternatives/libcudnn_stlib
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 59715990 Jun 10 13:07 libcudnn_static_v5.a
```

whereas nothing:

```
# ls /usr/local/cuda/lib64 | grep dnn
```
